Package org.opensourcephysics.display

Class InteractivePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.opensourcephysics.display.DrawingPanel
              • org.opensourcephysics.display.InteractivePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InteractiveMouseHandler, Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlottingPanel

    public class InteractivePanel
extends DrawingPanel
implements InteractiveMouseHandler
    InteractivePanel is a drawing panel that invokes the handleMouseAction method in Interactive objects.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
